nodes.text: Kufs, also known as The Ghost Moon, was a mysterious moon located in the Outer Rim Territories of the galaxy. After escaping the planet Vodran, Dec Hansen and Sari Nadle landed on Kufs. Nykkalt was a type of rare metal that flowed beneath Kufs' surface. Harra the Hutt used Kufs as a suitable fallback position, if her stronghold was ever threatened.
